app_review_information.notes: This is an offline educational app for learning guitar notes. All features work without internet connection. Test with VoiceOver enabled for accessibility features. The app includes haptic feedback, voice hints, and customizable quiz modes.

permissions.microphone: Used for voice input and pitch detection (optional)
permissions.audio: Used for playing notes and feedback sounds
permissions.haptic_feedback: Used for tactile feedback on correct/incorrect answers
